message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper focuses on the calculation of similarity between concepts in an ontology for a Human-Like Interaction system, which involves natural language processing and artificial intelligence techniques. Therefore, cs.AI and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a similarity function based on five dimensions, which involves machine learning and data analysis techniques, making cs.LG a likely sub-category as well. The evaluation of the proposal involves comparing system responses with those given by human test subjects, which involves human-computer interaction and user studies, making cs.IR and cs.SI likely sub-categories as well.
